songs.lyrics:
Ah, Yama
I'm 'bout to tell you a story
Ah
Yo prasanga ali samaya aghiko ho
Pahadai pahadko bichma yeuta basti thyo
Ek kisaanko gharma nawasisu janmiyo tara
Chhori po raichha bhani usko man jhaskiyo
Rees pokhna khojdai aafno srimati sanga jharkiyo
Ani aafno bhaagyalai kochdai khet tira larkiyo
Raati aber pachhi madhdhyapaan gari farkiyo
Ani kehi naboli aafno khaatmaa paltiyo
Bistaarai din haru dhaldai thyo
Usko din charyaa pheri saamaanya chaldaithyo
Kehi barsa pachhi uniharuko feri bachcha bho
Yespaali chhora paayera hola kisaan makhkha bho
Samaya bitdai jaada kisaan ki naani pani thuli bhain tara
Sadaiba baba ko helaamaa roirahin
Daauraa ra chulho paani padhero mai bhulirahin
Ujyaalomaa ta aai uni andhakar mai lukirahin

Uni gharmaa jahile aamaalaai saghaauthin
Kasaile nasake aafai daal bhaat pakaauthin
Bihaan samayamaa bhai lai school puryaauthin ani
Diuso bhari jungle maa gaai bhaisai charaauthin
Matra terha barsa ki unlai padhne man ta thyo
Tara buwale usko unlai paraayaa bhandathyo
Chhoriko bhalaai bhada faida ra ghaata samjhanthyo
Bihe gardina tamsanthyo tara daijo le jhaskanthyo
Ek din saajhmaa usko gharmaa ekjana paahuna aayo
Aafulai laahure bataaudai chhoriko haat magna thaalyo
Tetimai kisaanle usko garibi sunaauna thaalyo tara
Chhori diye pugchha bhani usle paau samaauna thaalyo
Aba kisaan danga bho usko man prasanna bho
Bholi nai pandit lai saait heraaunu parchha bhandiyo
Usko gharma aru kasaiko rajhaai ke chaldathyo
Jabarjasti aafnai chhori ko balbiwaah gardiyo

Aaja uni kaid chhin adhyaaro kothaamaa eklai
Sarir bhari ghaau chhan tara pidaa bhane beglai
Ruda rudai aakha dubai sunniyekaa chhan
Usko manko khaaldo kahile puriyela jhan
Yeuta aas thiyo unmaa nayaa jeevan banaaune
Biteka din birsi bartamaan aghi badhaaune
Tara manchhe le chaaheko yaha kaha hudo rahechha
Usko srimaan ta bhaaratmaa keti dalaal po rahechha
Uni kayou palta lutisakina sayou palta tutisakin
Sisa ta hoina tara bhitrai bata futisakin
Aaja kaa din samma dherai graahak sanga sutisakin
Bhagera umkina sahi samaya lai kurirahin
Yeuta din thiyo uni ekkaasi behosh bhain
Tesko chha saat mahinamaa uni ek aama banin
Aaja usko chulho aafnai sarir bata baldachha
Tara samaaj le uslai besyaa paatra gandachha
songs.title: Yo Prasanga
